website_summaries.verdict: Not a regulation-sized set, but a good pick if you are looking for colorful bocce balls for recreational play.
pros: Multi-colored balls with mid-range weight for casual play
Owners report that the manufacturer provides exceptional customer service
cons: Not regulation size – won't work for professional play
The bag that comes with the set is flimsy and doesn't match the quality of the balls

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set of bocce balls
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of bocce balls. The carrying case is just okay, it does not seem strong and I am not sure how long it'll last (that's why I take off one star). Also, the price is kind of high, I would expect that such a set can be found for less than $40. But again, the balls in this set are great.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: They work as a casual game set, but are smaller than other ball sets we have used. Also, the colors are only skin deep: they became completely scratched after only one use.
customer_reviews.author: w-who

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Excited to get my first bocce set and play with the family. Only to find all the balls are flat and are not even close to being round. Got the soft set thinking we could use it indoors but set is not playable. Do not buy the soft set unless you want to return them as they are defective.
customer_reviews.author: JMP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Bocci set!!
customer_reviews.text: The set is well made, brightly colored and comes in a handy carrying case. We cut the top off the cardboard box the set came in for shipping and put it back inside the carrying case for more stability. Love IT!
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this set for a friend of mine. His five year old granddaughter loves to play this now so it gives them something fun to do together. My wife and I play bocce ball often because it's a good excuse to get outside, get a little exercise and enjoy some fresh air and sunshine. Great game for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: who cares

customer_reviews.title: Bocce Ball
customer_reviews.text: New game for the family! I was not familiar with Bocce, but saw this pop up on Amazon and thought it looked like fun to try. Came in a nice little case, and I found as long as I left the cardboard in the case it kept it sturdy. Balls are nice looking, and have held up after many games. This game reminds me a lot of bowling-miniature bowling. Fun family game!
customer_reviews.author: D. D.

customer_reviews.title: Soft balls work great!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to play with on a camping trip in Utah where there would be desert rocks everywhere. Nothing broke. The soft balls are sturdy and played well!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Unusable Bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag for the balls, was torn all the way down one side. Totally unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Keller

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, it might be a little heavy for small children. My petite 6-year old seems to have a little difficulty controlling the ball. Balls have hit the concrete borders a few times and hardly scuffed. Overall a great set!
customer_reviews.author: Rictor Glass Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This set is exactly as described. We purchased it, along with other lawn games, for our wedding. It has since been used at multiple weddings, BBQs, and backyard gatherings. The real reason for my rating and review, though, is the excellent customer service! I wrote in because the jack from our bocce set was lost and one of the rungs from our ladder toss broke. I wanted to see if there was a way to buy spare parts for our sets. Upon providing proof of purchase, both replacements were sent to me free of charge. So happy with these purchases and with the level of customer service from this company! Can’t recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: CMHB

customer_reviews.title: None of the Bocce are remotely round!
customer_reviews.text: I got the rubber Bocce, and every single ball is deeply indented, so they do not roll and the way they land is redirected by the indent.
customer_reviews.author: Vino

customer_reviews.title: 14year olds loved this set - will buy for others as a present
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my boys a month ago and they finally took It out for a whirl so I can now give my review. Perfect. The fact that there were 4 couples meant that the 4 boys could play in teams of two. The balls were hard but sorry enough for playing on grass. One 14yo kid commented (who can never sit still), this hame is awesome, and he wanted to play longer. Really glad I picked these up I debated between soft and hard and went soft - so glad I did...some of his friends were very rough with them and these held up great
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G

customer_reviews.title: Missing the pallino!
customer_reviews.text: The pallino (small white ball) was missing from this bocce set. You can’t play bocce without it. Look elsewhere for a bocce set.
customer_reviews.author: A. Karlsson

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable!!
customer_reviews.text: Growing up my family played bocce constantly. I bought this set as a gift to my hubby. I thought the carrier looked great and the marker was a bonus but We played one game with these in a basic grassed yard, a few pine comes here and there but the balls were already scraped up. I am returning and gonna purchase a higher quality set elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JTE

customer_reviews.title: Product is awesome, one little problem though.
customer_reviews.text: Came missing the little white ball. I didn't want to return and re-purchase right before Christmas, so I got in contact with the Amazon. I told them I'd throw a golf ball in the gift and I asked them if they'd give me a discount. They did. Apart from the missing ball, this set is great! Ps. the gold ball works perfect. I'm glad I checked before wrapping, though.
customer_reviews.author: mamajen

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Deflated! But still can work...
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box to find out that 5 out of 6 balls are deflated (see the picture). I checked reviews and saw that it is usual problem with this product in 2020. Very disappointed! Update: I inflated the balls with Sportbit Ball Pump and they came to normal. Child is happy with variety of colors and quality of the game.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: the real deal
customer_reviews.text: seem to be every bit as good as those made 50 years ago. One of them took a roll off the picnic bench onto concrete, only took a small scuff. They were packaged really well, a box to contain the bag, then a box within the bag containing all the balls. I kept that inner box for structural support to the bag, otherwise they tumble over. Came with a good set of rules.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bocce ball set but so far I love it! They have a good weight to them and I love that they came with a carrying case. I wish the bag was stiffer so that it held the balls better. I ended up just leaving the cardboard box in the bag so that it could hold it's shape which is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had never played bocci ball before. This set has absolutely turned me into a fanatic. My wife and I play almost every night in the back yard and love it. A definite must have during the pandemic. Good quality product with instructions and a nice carrying case. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpitup

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun for Sure
customer_reviews.text: SO GIFTABLE. We got this for my father-in-law for Christmas and he loves it. We all played outside for hours Christmas Day and it was a blast. (They live in Florida...so it was warm.) I did not even understand what it was or why we were getting it and now I’m a huge fan. Got here on time with the ordering too.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn L Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Great Bocce Set - Better than Others!
customer_reviews.text: We have had a few other bocce sets and this one is by far the best. The balls are solid - not water filled, like some others. The balls are a good size, nice weight, and the finish is durable. We like the carrying case as well as the rope for measuring - both of these were additional features that we didn't receive with previous (other brand) sets. We use the set in our backyard and its been great!
customer_reviews.author: BruinsFan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of bocce balls. These are a huge step up from the rinky dink ones you buy at the “souvenir” shops. These will be great for playing on the beach or camping and I am looking forward to using these a lot. They seem to be well made and should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for two or Four players
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing this game at neighborhood parties. It’s typically a 2 player game but is often played with 4 players. I like that this set had four different colors so that more people can join the fun. The balls have a good weight to them and the carry case is a nice bonus. We decided to keep the cardboard box inside the canvas bag to maintain the structure, otherwise it is floppy. I would recommend this set to anyone who wants an outdoor game that people of all ages and physical abilities can enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great Bocce Ball Set According to a Rookie
customer_reviews.text: I am fairly new to bocce ball, but as far as I can tell, this is a great set. I've played with it quite a few times now and it has held up well. The balls still look great and the carrying case is still working well. I like having four colors too. I've played with two teams, where each team had two colors. I've also mixed it up and played with four teams, where each team had their own color. This is a great outdoor lawn game that you can take anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: William Scheremet

customer_reviews.title: It’s great, just keep the cardboard box inside the bag
customer_reviews.text: Keep the box it comes in so you can put it inside the cloth bag. The cloth bag is not rigid, so just keep the box in it, with the flaps folded down. Otherwise this works great and we’ve been enjoying playing this game while stuck at home in quarantine. Try not to hit the cats with the balls, though!
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: We had gone to the beach (PacNW) with some friends a few months ago and they brought along a bocce set which was a big hit with all. Looking for a set with solid core balls that can hold up to being rolled into the occasional rock, etc. Bought these and have used them a couple of times now. Appear to be made well, solid carrying case and the four sets of colors allows for your choice of 4 individual players or two teams of two. Pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DKA

customer_reviews.title: good price good quality
customer_reviews.text: Always grew up playing bocce with my family. It's about time I got a set of my own. I didn't want to spend a lot of money, I know some sets can be pretty high in price. I also didn't want a cheap set that was going to be really poorly made either. I was very pleased when I searched on Amazon and this set popped right up. The set looks sharp and and comes with everything you need. It doesn't look cheap by any means. The set even comes with instructions on different ways to play and a measuring tool.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Buy solid resin if you can!!
customer_reviews.text: Within the THIRD game of playing one of the ball's broke. Now I wish I would bought the set mt husband wanted to buy. I'm sad because it's such a fun game. I thought these were solid resin balls but they're NOT. It looks like they are cement coated in 3/4" of resin. According to the inside of the ball when it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THESE PANCAKES
customer_reviews.text: Half the balls showed up flat. I thought maybe it was a case of a few bad apples spoiling the bunch in the reviews but no - DO NOT BUY THESE. They will show up deflated. Edit: every ball is flat. There is no instruction saying this is proper and they should be inflated manually.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game and super high quality balls and tote bag. We’ve played on soft grass, rocky uneven grass, sand...and it’s still holding up. I suggest keep the inside cardboard box to support the canvas bag for storing and carrying.
customer_reviews.author: azpartyof5

customer_reviews.title: Gets the kids outside
customer_reviews.text: For my kids to get them out of the house. But, the little white ball disappears into the lawn when we toss it out so I have opted to use a bright tennis ball instead. For true outdoor play, as opposed to court play on dirt, it would be nice if they included a secondary ball that was similar to a tennis ball in size and color.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for our family's first bocce set, and I am so glad that I chose these. We took them out to a bocce court yesterday. We had so much fun! So.....just perfect so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FUN FOR THE FAMILY!
customer_reviews.text: During this Covid time that everything is closed where we live, I've been looking for games my family and I could play outdoor. I came across this game on Social Media, and I found it Amazon to purchase. Since we got it, we have had so much fun! It's great for the whole family to play. The color of the balls are so beautiful and bright. The balls are small, and not too heavy for my four year old daughter to toss. We love going to the park to play. This is great for families looking for new games to play together. This would make a wonderful gift as well! We don't follow the rules exactly but that's ok. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality and construction of this set is great. When received the packaging was great with each ball individually wrapped and carrying bag allows for easy storage. ONLY recommendation is some type of padding to the handle to add comfort carrying set down to the beach or park. Used the set handfull of times and overall durability of the balls are great with very little scuffing or chips from hitting one another. Happy with purchase and would recommend set with 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, portable, great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for Father’s Day, it was a big hit! It’s a great beach game! The balls are super sturdy and not too heavy. Plus the carrying case is very convenient. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deformed Balls, Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase the soft balls. Almost every single one arrived deformed.
customer_reviews.author: AMelt

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift!! Got this for my boyfriend as we go to the beach often. He loves it! It’s really nice quality, and the bag is great too. Highly recommend for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Great Bocce Set
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set for a good price, this is a real bocce set, loved it at the beach and know it will be great in the back yard as well. Not the cheap version!
customer_reviews.author: Amy May

customer_reviews.title: Case is not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This case was torn on arrival, and the zipper broke and fell off completely the first time we opened it. We needed these for an event so didn't have time to return and wait for a replacement, but very disappointed in the quality. The balls are pretty scratched after first couple uses too.
customer_reviews.author: Erika B

customer_reviews.title: Dented and not the shape of a ball!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! We just opened them today, excited to play with the kids and only one blue ball is actually round. The rest are all dented!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because it fit my bill. I wanted a bocce set that was sturdy and affordable. I did not need a lot of balls, but I wanted the balls to be comfortable in the hand, and durable. I purchased this set based on the reviews from other customers, and I haven't been disappointed. The balls feel great, and the bag that the game comes in makes the game highly portable. If you are looking for set of bocce for your kids, go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set, but if you're buying as a gift, either pay extra for gift wrap or have it shipped elsewhere...packaging is NOT discreet!
customer_reviews.author: N. M.

customer_reviews.title: Played our first game with these and they were great
customer_reviews.text: This set came up on a couple of review sites as the best Bocce Ball set to buy. At 90mm they are apparently just a bit smaller than regulation (I guess that's 100mm), but I wouldn't even have known that had I not read it somewhere. The slightly smaller size was nice for the kids with smaller hands in our group. We also like the 4 colors which makes it easier for 4 people to play and distinguish each players balls.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint, the sand sticks to them. Maybe a matte finish on the ball would change that. Great for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable Bocce ball set. We bought this to go with our backyard game collection. Everything is super durable and doesn't chip easily. We have thrown these a bit harder than we should and they hit cement pavers and still not a crack or chip in sight. Solid build.
customer_reviews.author: Sharks93

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful group game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 32 year old daughter at her request for her birthday. I didn't really understand her enthusiasm for this game until I played it with her, her brother, and my husband. It is great fun, but the best part is that someone who is athletic doesn't have a great advantage over someone who isn't. You can play it on any grassy surface. It doesn't have to be flat, we played on a sloppy very uneven field of grass. The uneven-ness just made the game more interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Trometer

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Played a couple games with them. So far so good. They were a hit at the party. They are cheap and good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great Bocce Ball Set
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried that for the low price the quality was going to be less, but was pleasantly surprised at the great quality of this Bocce Set. The colors are nice and bright so you can see them if you are playing in your yard. Balls are durable and good weight. This was just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: JA642

customer_reviews.title: at a similar price point before and the balls were not nearly as nice. This is a great purchase for the backyard ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised in the quality of this set. I have purchased a set, at a similar price point before and the balls were not nearly as nice. This is a great purchase for the backyard or beach. We had a nice time playing on Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price - well made set
customer_reviews.text: Got this set during while pandemic house bound. The set is well made with a sturdy carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Migliori

customer_reviews.title: Well made set.
customer_reviews.text: This bocce set came nicely packed with its own carrying case. Everything appears to be sturdy and well made. The true test will be my maniacal family playing bocce in the sand with beers in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids as they are squishy and won’t crush toes (would still hurt). Great set for a family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bocce Ball Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Heavy balls. Bright colors. We’ve had lots of family fun with this set. Comes in fabric carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for my husband for Christmas. It’s nice and heavy! He works away from home and stays on call all the time, and that can get boring. So, he and the guys he works with love to find games to play to pass the time. This is going to be perfect for them!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: great simple bocce set!
customer_reviews.text: simple bocce set. balls seem durable and hold up well. colors are vivid. carrying case that they come with is nice and sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: Paige McKeown

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and waight
customer_reviews.text: These have been lots of fun right from the start. Good quality and well weighted.
customer_reviews.author: krys

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game to play with the entire family including kids, parents and grandparents!
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my parents and they love it! The carrying case provides a nice, easly place to store all the different pieces. The measuring tool also makes it simple to clearly see who had the best throw. They have only used it once but it seems great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but one ball is dented
customer_reviews.text: Kids love them fun to play in driveway yard or anywhere. One ball is permanently deformed but just makes for a more challenging game. We give it to the best player sort of a handicap for the rest of us.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of Bocce set to learn the game and for backyard use. It comes with everything you need to play the game and has its own carrying case. All Bocce balls ultimately chip over time. At this price point you can order a second set and replace balls in the event of damage.
customer_reviews.author: Colette C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product that should provide years of backyard fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally had to replace a 40 year old bocce set. Based on Amazon reviews, we gave GoSports set a try, and we are not disappointed. Solid construction, compact storage, bright colors - this set has everything you need for years of backyard fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely packaged. Each ball was wrapped so it didn’t get damaged. My only complaint is that the balls don’t roll in a straight line towards the white ball or stop when I yell at them to. 😢
customer_reviews.author: gc

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as I thought it would be. The balls, pallino, and measuring device are all you need to get started. I have a bocce ball court in my neighborhood and thought this would be a good social outlet.
customer_reviews.author: jon w petersen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about buying this without feeling the weight, but they're great! Feel great, sturdy and look great. I only wish the bag had a long strap instead of just hand straps.
customer_reviews.author: dotmom

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible! We absolutely love playing with this set! Super durable!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Green

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and a great game for whole family to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: good quality, nice colors!
customer_reviews.text: These are 90mm balls so they are not the official size but they get the job done with lots of fun in the backyard or at the beach. Balls come in a nice little zipper-topped bag with a sturdy fabric handle and even a long string for measuring distances to prove to your spouse that indeed YOUR BALL IS CLOSER SO YOU WIN AND SHE LOSES.
customer_reviews.author: Timbobo

customer_reviews.title: A hit at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: This game is a hit at the beach! The product is durable, heavy. It comes in a easy to use and small storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and transport bocce set
customer_reviews.text: Great bocce set for the beach or back yard. Colors are bright and the carrying case make it easy to take on trips. My family of 4 loves the game. Careful of stones in the playing area as they will scratch the resin balls. I would recommend this set to anyone that like yard games.
customer_reviews.author: Day Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good product, fun game
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged nicely with easy-to-understand instructions. The bocce balls seem durable, and it's fun to use the measuring string for close calls.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: I had a set from a year ago that were great.  This year they are not the same, (not as full).
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to add to a set I already owned. The new set was not as full as the others. I sent them back and re-ordered hoping it was just a mishap. The next set came, same thing not as full. You can add air with a hand pump. This does make them better, however still not as good as the original bought last year. We only play for fun so they work out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and quality game
customer_reviews.text: Bocce is a fun activity for all ages and skills. This set is great quality and looks good. Love the carrying case! These look like they will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: The T's

customer_reviews.title: Play Ball!
customer_reviews.text: This game was happily received by my 3 grandsons, who played it a lot during their visit. All components are very good except that the container for the game is somewhat flimsy for the weight of the balls. In all other respects it has been a great hit!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie James

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: The set is a great way for kids to safely play... except the white pallino ball was missing making the game kind of useless. Edit- they were able to fix the issue quickly and send me a replacement for the missing ball
customer_reviews.author: Lauren0391

customer_reviews.title: BOCCE FOR LIFE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Nice carrying bag, super durable and quality balls! Very happy with my purchase! Also, just for writing this review the company is going to donate a sports ball (football, basketball, or soccer ball) to a kid in need!!!! Super cool move! Proud of you GoSports!!
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun...
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved playo g this game. The adults as well. Great party game.
customer_reviews.author: Jovonne

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for our office happy hours. When it came in, one of the balls was partially deflated. I emailed the company and they promptly replied. I had a replacement ball in less than a week. Yesterday we broke out the set for the first time and everyone had a great time playing. I can't speak to durability, since we only just used it for the first time, but the bocce balls and pallino have good heft to them and they roll smoothly on industrial-type carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Allison DeLand

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Solid, heavy balls in a carrying bag with instructions. Exactly what it says it is - reasonably priced bocce ball set that’s easy to use and simple to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Hedgehog

customer_reviews.title: Great beach game!
customer_reviews.text: Feels sturdy and well made. Much better than the cheap water filled kind.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D

customer_reviews.title: Great backyard game during a pandemic
customer_reviews.text: This set is packed perfectly when storing, while being colorful and a fun, easy game for all ages. Just what we needed in these "homebound" times!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These are solid. A different (and cheaper) set I received as a gift last year lasted half a game as the balls chipped and were useless. This set is well made with no destruction of the balls even with some big hits.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Solid, strong, heavy.  Great buy especially at this price.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. Heavy, solid balls that are a joy to use. My only complaint is about the case, if you take the cardboard box out of it then it doesn't hold it's form.. I was worried the cardboard would just get soggy over time, so the bag is all misshapen when you put the stuff away. Not really impactful to the game or anything, just bugged me a bit.. for no really good reason.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Bocce Set with 8 Balls
customer_reviews.text: I was at a family mountain camping trip and we played this. It is a fun and sometimes challenging family game. Everyone enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack M Vosburgh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice quality! I wish the carrying bag held its structure more once you remove the packaging, but that's a minor thing. The actual bocce balls are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Lee Donor

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I used this product at the beach with my family. The balls seem to be good quality. They hit each other while we were playing but only sustained some scratches. The color does appear to be fading already though, which is disappointing. I left the box inside the case which makes it more effective at carrying the weight of all the balls.
customer_reviews.author: jjax

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. A really substantial set! The balls are a nice heavy weight like they should be, the measuring device is handy, the case is well made, as in it has not broken after a few tracks to the park (it came with a cardboard box inside the fabric case, we kept the box inside of it to help the fabric case keep a cube like structure) and this set includes the Jack. Cool and convenient game to grab on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality set
customer_reviews.text: This set has everything you need to just go outside and start playing. The balls have a good weight to them, the colors are vibrant, and they don't scuff easily. The carrying case is really nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Sausage

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set during SIP, very happy with it, 4 colors are better than traditional two colors, we have three people at home, so it works better.
customer_reviews.author: Anni Wang

customer_reviews.title: Fun for whole family
customer_reviews.text: Simple, durable outside fun for all ages (ok, bigger than say toddlers) and abilities.
customer_reviews.author: saw

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Had a small issue with a damaged item. But it was replaced in 2 days!!! Very happy with their quick response. Now I’m able to enjoy bocce during my family vacation on the beach with a brand new set. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: neil

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Bocci ball set. High quality. Love the compactness of it. Excellent case.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W

customer_reviews.title: 4 Color Bocce Ball Set
customer_reviews.text: One of the better packaged products I’ve seen. Each of the 8 balls individually wrapped in bubble wrap inside of cardboard box inside of canvas tote bag. Well done. Ball material first rate, sturdy and solid. Nice colors. All will stand up to balls colliding into each other repeatedly over time.
customer_reviews.author: Krista & Matt

customer_reviews.title: My family loves this game!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a perfect backyard activity for my family of four. Pleased with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: ... are NOT standard size Bocce Balls - a bit disappointed that they are not regulation size - I guess ...
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT standard size Bocce Balls - a bit disappointed that they are not regulation size - I guess my kids will have fun rolling them around the backyard rather than taking them to the Bocce Courts in town. Too expensive to send back
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: The balls are solid and colorful & the carrying it comes with is a convenient extra. My last set was filled with water that leaked and came in a cardboard box that was flimsy. We have had this set for about a month and have enjoyed playing it with our grandson during his visits.
customer_reviews.author: DDN

customer_reviews.title: Bocce Ball Great for Events.
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this for a work event however some of the parts were missing which was a disappointment otherwise they are of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Broennle

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know much about this product, it was given as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Wall

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this product is what I hoped it'd be. Sturdy and heavy duty. Haven't used yet, but I expect it to perform well and stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer3288

customer_reviews.title: Best set ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Daughter for Christmas and she loved it. I bought her one last year but it didn't last. This one you can tell will and is well worth the money. I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: colleen yattow

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set but the paint comes right off. Not a bug deal though. Nice carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: clayton wise

product_meta.title: GoSports 90mm Backyard Bocce Set with 8 Balls, Pallino, Case and Measuring Rope
feature_bullets: COMPLETE SET: 90mm (3.54") Bocce Balls weighing 1lb 11oz each, (2 Red + 2 Green + 2 Blue + 2 Yellow)
CANVAS BOCCE BAG: Includes durable canvas carrying case to easily enjoy Bocce outdoors and to store after use

HIGH GLOSS BALLS: 8 premium balls with 2 Red (1 Circle Cut, 1 Square Cut), 2 Blue (1 Circle Cut, 1 Square Cut), 2 Green (1 Circle Cut, 1 Square Cut), 2 Yellow (1 Circle Cut, 1 Square Cut) and 1 40mm white Pallino
PREMIUM CONSTRUCTION: Compare against other low quality brands that use cheap resin leading to cloudy finishes
GOSPORTS PLEDGE: GoSports is a US Company with US Customer Support - 100% Satisfaction
